sentence.Network_en: In the light of different deformation characteristics, 8 deformational types are divided.
sentence.Network_cn: 依据不同的变形特点, 可划分出8种不同的变形类型.

sentence.Network_en: Fault space textures include deformational texture and geometric texture.
sentence.Network_cn: 断层空间结构包括变形结构和几何结构两部分.

sentence.Network_en: There are various types of primary sedimentary structures and secondary deformational structures in Dakeng Formation.
sentence.Network_cn: 江西修水县西北部元古代九岭群大坑组露头较好,各种原生沉积构造及次生变形构造发育.

PerfectNetExp.abs: on basis of the deformational and geometric texture analyses of main faults in Shibanxi area , model of fault space textures and their ore-control rule are studied .本文在解析石板溪金矿区主要断层变形结构和几何结构的基础上，探讨了其空间结构模式和控矿规律。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or causing change in either shape or size of a material body or geometric figure
